Name: oprcom
column6: commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
column6: negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprlsortop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the left-hand operand

Name: oprrsortop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the right-hand operand

Name: oprrest
column6: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprjoin
column6: join selectivity estimation function for this operator
